metadata.title: CVE-2023-28708 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: When using the RemoteIpFilter with requests received from a reverse proxyvia HTTP that include the X-Forwarded-Proto header set to https, sessioncookies created by Apache Tomcat 11.0.0-M1 to 11.0.0.-M2, 10.1.0-M1 to10.1.5, 9.0.0-M1 to 9.0.71 and 8.5.0 to 8.5.85 did not include the secureattribute. This could result in the user agent transmitting the sessioncookie over an insecure channel.

criterions.comment: tomcat9 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
